title: Ticket #3293: Tunnel Bosco file transfers over ssh
description:
In Bosco, the connections made from the ft-gahp to the gridmanager for file transfer should be tunneled over the ssh connection. That eliminates the need to have network connectivity from the cluster front-end node back to the submit machine.

When starting the ft-gahp, we can use the -R option to tell ssh to create a port on the remote machine and forward connections from there to the gridmanager's command port.

This code almost certainly doesn't work with IPV6.
